Megatons grin widens even more as he hears the question. His association
with the Black Fortress Predacons and the ceasefire he'd negotiated with the
now Maximal city Maximals had him realizing his full potential to unite the
Decepticons and Predacons under an advanced leadership model. "I accept." he
says as he shrinks down, transforming to his warped robot mode. His T-rex
legs hunched from the waist down, his now smaller dragon wings folded on his
back and the two tails that now attached to his arms flipped backward to
thier inactive state. "On the condition that Megatron is handled like the
primative unit that he is." He knew that the unity would make them
unstopable, and he also knew that there was only one bot with the cunning
and manipulative skills to lead them. That leader would one day be MEGATON.

As the conversation continued a message apeared to him. The mutant didn't
know what it meant he just knew that it was meant for his predacessor. He
knew that the DNA from Megatron had its advantages, now he could add another
advantage could be added.
----- Original Message -----
From: <gunthers@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, August 10, 2001 11:33 AM
Subject: Finally talking to Megaton/Constructicons Decision


> Havotron, after thinking for a long long time, looks to Megaton.
> "So, Megaton is it? Will you become a warrior in the
> Decepticons for Earth's Domination's ranks, or will you become or
> enemy." He said with a grin, glancing at Spinister, then to
> Needlenose.
>
> Needlenose walked to beside Spinister, not hiding the fear he had
> in his eyes.
> =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
>
> Dreadwing finally saw the the Decepticon base below the water.
> Diving straight at it the combined bot fired missiles at the roof,
> through the water, for the roof to try andm ake a whole in it.
>
